Title: Beta Test
Text: You can place this Milestone adjacent to Features that are In Progress.

Title: Demo Version
Text: At least 1 Ticket must be opened when you place this Milestone.

Title: Conference
Text: Your Product must have at least 1 Feature with 4 or 8 Story Points.

Title: Release 1.0
Text: Each incomplete Feature costs -1 Story Point to the Product when calculating score for this Milestone.

Title: First Valuation
Text: Pick a number. Features that cost that many Story Points, cost +1 Story Point more when calculating score for this Milestone.

Title: Product-Market Fit
Text: Pick one connector type. Features with at least 1 connector of that type cost +1 Story Point when calculating score for this Milestone.
